## stopWhen() function

Stop the walker using a predicate function. Return `false` to stop and `true` to continue. The predicate is ran before the callback function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function stopWhen<P extends CallbackParams<any[]>, R>(predicate: StopPredicateFunction<P>, fn: Callback<P, R>): Callback<P, R>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  predicate | [StopPredicateFunction](./flipclock.stoppredicatefunction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P&gt; |  |
|  fn | [Callback](./flipclock.callback.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, R&gt; |  |

**Returns:**

[Callback](./flipclock.callback.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, R&gt;
